div.p: You are why we do what we do. Providing you with the best possible experience every time you walk through our doors is our primary focus. Because of you, we seek out the most cutting edge products, services, technology, equipment and training.

a.t-att-href: keep('/shop/product/%s' % slug(product), page=(pager['page']['num'] if pager['page']['num']>1 else None))

hr.t-if: sum([(1 if len(l.value_ids)==1 else 0) for l in product.attribute_line_ids])

div.style: width: 170px; height:130px; float:left; display:inline; margin-right: 10px; overflow:hidden;

span.t-att-style: 'text-decoration: line-through; white-space: nowrap; ' + '' if product.website_price_difference and website.get_current_pricelist().discount_policy == 'without_discount' else 'display: none;'
